name: Hero's Curse
description:
In this game you experience the mighty Hero's final journey as he tries to find the Evil Wizard of Time and defeat him. While confronting him, the Evil Wizard manages to cast a curse on the Hero - Time Rewind Curse Magic, and teleports away. The curse causes the Hero to lose his strength and abilities over time, one might say they are being Rewound back in time, the Hero's state is being rewound to a beginner state of him self.

Will the Hero manage to find the Evil Wizard and be able to defeat him once and for all while being powerless?
